title: 3D TATTOO FONTS
content:
Hi Typophiles,  
 I created some great 3d tattoo fonts that you can see on a dedicated website [TattooFont3D.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416205528/http:/www.tattoofont3d.com/)  
-feel free to download test and comment freeware tattoo fonts available in the downloads section  
-discover our tattoo fonts in our Gallery and in Video  
- Submit an article, submit a designing idea  
- Buy exclusively one of our tattoo fonts to remove it from our listing  
-

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416205528im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3DMAOHI_4099.gif)

Best regards  
AAS
author: TATTOOFONT3D
